svg: <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="2" fill="currentColor"/> <path d="M8.5 8.5c-2 2-2 5 0 7m7-7c2 2 2 5 0 7" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"/> <path d="M5.5 5.5c-3.5 3.5-3.5 9 0 12.5m13-12.5c3.5 3.5 3.5 9 0 12.5" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round"/> <circle cx="12" cy="12" r="9" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.5" opacity="0.3"/>
